Serialized Form

  • Package org.proto4j.graph

    • Class org.proto4j.graph.JBracketView extends javax.swing.JComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cellRenderer
          BracketCellRenderer<? super T> cellRenderer
          The cell renderer used to paint all brackets/cells of this view.
          See Also:
          BracketCellRenderer
        • constraints
          BracketConstraints constraints
          All attributes of this JBracketView are stored in this separate object. This object will also be used as the BracketLocator if none has been set via setLocator(BracketLocator).
          See Also:
          BracketConstraints, BracketLocator
        • dataModel
          BracketModel<T> dataModel
          The data model used to store the value of each cell separately. Each column can contain a different amount of rows.
          See Also:
          BracketModel
        • lineColor
          java.awt.Color lineColor
          The line color used to paint the lines between the brackets/cells.
        • lineRenderer
          BracketLinePainter lineRenderer
          The line painter used to draw the lines between the brackets/cells. Note that there will be no lines if no BracketLinePainter has been set.
          See Also:
          BracketLinePainter
        • locator
          BracketLocator locator
          The BracketLocator is used to compute the relative position of each bracket/cell.
          See Also:
          BracketLocator
        • rendererPane
          javax.swing.CellRendererPane rendererPane
          To be able to paint the cells maintained by this JBracketView, an extra rendering component is used.
